profile.name: Aaron Turon
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Fastly
profile.summary: Highly skilled software engineer with expertise in networking, web development, and compiler design. Proven track record of contributing to open-source projects and driving technical innovation.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led the development of a high-performance caching system for Fastly's edge network.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features, resulting in significant performance improvements.

experience.title: Core Contributor, Rust Language Project
description: Contributed to the development of the Rust compiler and runtime.
Worked closely with other contributors to ensure stability and performance of the language.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple Rust projects, including a popular crate for networking.
Collaborated with clients to understand their needs and deliver high-quality solutions.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained multiple Rust projects, including a popular crate for networking.
Ensured the stability and security of these projects through regular updates and bug fixes.
